name: Daily Notebook Runner

on:
  schedule:
    - cron: '0 8 * * *'  # Runs every day at 4:00 AM UTC
  workflow_dispatch:     # Allows manual run

jobs:
  run-notebooks:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout repository
        uses: actions/checkout@v3

      - name: Set up Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v4
        with:
          python-version: 3.10

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: |
          pip install -r requirements.txt
          pip install nbconvert papermill

      - name: Run all notebooks sequentially
        run: |
          python notebooks/master_notebook_runner.py

      - name: Commit and push changes
        run: |
          git config --global user.email "github-actions@users.noreply.github.com"
          git config --global user.name "github-actions"
          git add .
          git commit -m "Daily notebook run at $(date +'%Y-%m-%d %H:%M')" || echo "No changes to commit"
          git push origin main
